4346  wc.lpszClassName = olcT("OLC_PIXEL_GAME_ENGINE");
4347  RegisterClass(&wc);
4348 
4349  // Define window furniture
4350  DWORD dwExStyle = WS_EX_APPWINDOW | WS_EX_WINDOWEDGE;
4351  DWORD dwStyle = WS_CAPTION | WS_SYSMENU | WS_VISIBLE | WS_THICKFRAME;
4352 
4353  olc::vi2d vTopLeft = vWindowPos;
4354 
4355  // Handle Fullscreen
4356  if (bFullScreen)
4357  {
4358  dwExStyle = 0;
4359  dwStyle = WS_VISIBLE | WS_POPUP;
4360  HMONITOR hmon = MonitorFromWindow(olc_hWnd, MONITOR_DEFAULTTONEAREST);
4361  MONITORINFO mi = { sizeof(mi) };
4362  if (!GetMonitorInfo(hmon, &mi)) return olc::rcode::FAIL;
4363  vWindowSize = { mi.rcMonitor.right, mi.rcMonitor.bottom };
4364  vTopLeft.x = 0;
4365  vTopLeft.y = 0;
4366  }
4367 
4368  // Keep client size as requested
4369  RECT rWndRect = { 0, 0, vWindowSize.x, vWindowSize.y };
4370  AdjustWindowRectEx(&rWndRect, dwStyle, FALSE, dwExStyle);
4371  int width = rWndRect.right - rWndRect.left;
4372  int height = rWndRect.bottom - rWndRect.top;
4373 
4374  olc_hWnd = CreateWindowEx(dwExStyle, olcT("OLC_PIXEL_GAME_ENGINE"), olcT(""), dwStyle,
4375  vTopLeft.x, vTopLeft.y, width, height, NULL, NULL, GetModuleHandle(nullptr), this);
4376 
4377  // Create Keyboard Mapping
4378  mapKeys[0x00] = Key::NONE;
4379  mapKeys[0x41] = Key::A; mapKeys[0x42] = Key::B; mapKeys[0x43] = Key::C; mapKeys[0x44] = Key::D; mapKeys[0x45] = Key::E;
4380  mapKeys[0x46] = Key::F; mapKeys[0x47] = Key::G; mapKeys[0x48] = Key::H; mapKeys[0x49] = Key::I; mapKeys[0x4A] = Key::J;
4381  mapKeys[0x4B] = Key::K; mapKeys[0x4C] = Key::L; mapKeys[0x4D] = Key::M; mapKeys[0x4E] = Key::N; mapKeys[0x4F] = Key::O;
4382  mapKeys[0x50] = Key::P; mapKeys[0x51] = Key::Q; mapKeys[0x52] = Key::R; mapKeys[0x53] = Key::S; mapKeys[0x54] = Key::T;
4383  mapKeys[0x55] = Key::U; mapKeys[0x56] = Key::V; mapKeys[0x57] = Key::W; mapKeys[0x58] = Key::X; mapKeys[0x59] = Key::Y;
4384  mapKeys[0x5A] = Key::Z;
4385 
4386  mapKeys[VK_F1] = Key::F1; mapKeys[VK_F2] = Key::F2; mapKeys[VK_F3] = Key::F3; mapKeys[VK_F4] = Key::F4;
4387  mapKeys[VK_F5] = Key::F5; mapKeys[VK_F6] = Key::F6; mapKeys[VK_F7] = Key::F7; mapKeys[VK_F8] = Key::F8;
4388  mapKeys[VK_F9] = Key::F9; mapKeys[VK_F10] = Key::F10; mapKeys[VK_F11] = Key::F11; mapKeys[VK_F12] = Key::F12;
4389 
4390  mapKeys[VK_DOWN] = Key::DOWN; mapKeys[VK_LEFT] = Key::LEFT; mapKeys[VK_RIGHT] = Key::RIGHT; mapKeys[VK_UP] = Key::UP;
4391  mapKeys[VK_RETURN] = Key::ENTER; //mapKeys[VK_RETURN] = Key::RETURN;
4392 
4393  mapKeys[VK_BACK] = Key::BACK; mapKeys[VK_ESCAPE] = Key::ESCAPE; mapKeys[VK_RETURN] = Key::ENTER; mapKeys[VK_PAUSE] = Key::PAUSE;
4394  mapKeys[VK_SCROLL] = Key::SCROLL; mapKeys[VK_TAB] = Key::TAB; mapKeys[VK_DELETE] = Key::DEL; mapKeys[VK_HOME] = Key::HOME;
4395  mapKeys[VK_END] = Key::END; mapKeys[VK_PRIOR] = Key::PGUP; mapKeys[VK_NEXT] = Key::PGDN; mapKeys[VK_INSERT] = Key::INS;
4396  mapKeys[VK_SHIFT] = Key::SHIFT; mapKeys[VK_CONTROL] = Key::CTRL;
4397  mapKeys[VK_SPACE] = Key::SPACE;
4398 
4399  mapKeys[0x30] = Key::K0; mapKeys[0x31] = Key::K1; mapKeys[0x32] = Key::K2; mapKeys[0x33] = Key::K3; mapKeys[0x34] = Key::K4;
4400  mapKeys[0x35] = Key::K5; mapKeys[0x36] = Key::K6; mapKeys[0x37] = Key::K7; mapKeys[0x38] = Key::K8; mapKeys[0x39] = Key::K9;
4401 
4402  mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD0] = Key::NP0; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD1] = Key::NP1; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD2] = Key::NP2; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD3] = Key::NP3; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD4] = Key::NP4;
4403  mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD5] = Key::NP5; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD6] = Key::NP6; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD7] = Key::NP7; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD8] = Key::NP8; mapKeys[VK_NUMPAD9] = Key::NP9;
4404  mapKeys[VK_MULTIPLY] = Key::NP_MUL; mapKeys[VK_ADD] = Key::NP_ADD; mapKeys[VK_DIVIDE] = Key::NP_DIV; mapKeys[VK_SUBTRACT] = Key::NP_SUB; mapKeys[VK_DECIMAL] = Key::NP_DECIMAL;
4405 
4406  // Thanks scripticuk
4407  mapKeys[VK_OEM_1] = Key::OEM_1; // On US and UK keyboards this is the ';:' key
4408  mapKeys[VK_OEM_2] = Key::OEM_2; // On US and UK keyboards this is the '/?' key
4409  mapKeys[VK_OEM_3] = Key::OEM_3; // On US keyboard this is the '~' key
4410  mapKeys[VK_OEM_4] = Key::OEM_4; // On US and UK keyboards this is the '[{' key
4411  mapKeys[VK_OEM_5] = Key::OEM_5; // On US keyboard this is '\|' key.
4412  mapKeys[VK_OEM_6] = Key::OEM_6; // On US and UK keyboards this is the ']}' key
4413  mapKeys[VK_OEM_7] = Key::OEM_7; // On US keyboard this is the single/double quote key. On UK, this is the single quote/@ symbol key
4414  mapKeys[VK_OEM_8] = Key::OEM_8; // miscellaneous characters. Varies by keyboard
4415  mapKeys[VK_OEM_PLUS] = Key::EQUALS; // the '+' key on any keyboard
4416  mapKeys[VK_OEM_COMMA] = Key::COMMA; // the comma key on any keyboard
4417  mapKeys[VK_OEM_MINUS] = Key::MINUS; // the minus key on any keyboard
4418  mapKeys[VK_OEM_PERIOD] = Key::PERIOD; // the period key on any keyboard
4419  mapKeys[VK_CAPITAL] = Key::CAPS_LOCK;
4420  return olc::OK;
4421  }
4422 
4423  virtual olc::rcode SetWindowTitle(const std::string& s) override
4424  {
4425 #ifdef UNICODE
4426  SetWindowText(olc_hWnd, ConvertS2W(s).c_str());
4427 #else
4428  SetWindowText(olc_hWnd, s.c_str());
4429 #endif
4430  return olc::OK;
4431  }
4432 
4433  virtual olc::rcode StartSystemEventLoop() override
4434  {
4435  MSG msg;
4436  while (GetMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0) > 0)
4437  {
4438  TranslateMessage(&msg);
4439  DispatchMessage(&msg);
4440  }
4441  return olc::OK;
4442  }
4443 
4444  virtual olc::rcode HandleSystemEvent() override { return olc::rcode::FAIL; }
4445 
4446  // Windows Event Handler - this is statically connected to the windows event system
4447  static LRESULT CALLBACK olc_WindowEvent(HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
4448  {
4449  switch (uMsg)
4450  {
4451  case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
4452  {
4453  // Thanks @ForAbby (Discord)
4454  uint16_t x = lParam & 0xFFFF; uint16_t y = (lParam >> 16) & 0xFFFF;
4455  int16_t ix = *(int16_t*)&x; int16_t iy = *(int16_t*)&y;
4456  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouse(ix, iy);
4457  return 0;
4458  }
4459  case WM_SIZE: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateWindowSize(lParam & 0xFFFF, (lParam >> 16) & 0xFFFF); return 0;
4460  case WM_MOUSEWHEEL: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseWheel(GET_WHEEL_DELTA_WPARAM(wParam)); return 0;
4461  case WM_MOUSELEAVE: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseFocus(false); return 0;
4462  case WM_SETFOCUS: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(true); return 0;
4463  case WM_KILLFOCUS: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(false); return 0;
4464  case WM_KEYDOWN: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[wParam], true); return 0;
4465  case WM_KEYUP: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[wParam], false); return 0;
4466  case WM_SYSKEYDOWN: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[wParam], true); return 0;
4467  case WM_SYSKEYUP: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[wParam], false); return 0;
4468  case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, true); return 0;
4469  case WM_LBUTTONUP: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, false); return 0;
4470  case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, true); return 0;
4471  case WM_RBUTTONUP: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, false); return 0;
4472  case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, true); return 0;
4473  case WM_MBUTTONUP: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, false); return 0;
4474  case WM_CLOSE: ptrPGE->olc_Terminate(); return 0;
4475  case WM_DESTROY: PostQuitMessage(0); DestroyWindow(hWnd); return 0;
4476  }
4477  return DefWindowProc(hWnd, uMsg, wParam, lParam);
4478  }
4479  };
4480 }
4481 #endif
4482 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4483 // | END PLATFORM: MICROSOFT WINDOWS XP, VISTA, 7, 8, 10 |
4484 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4485 #pragma endregion
4486 
4487 #pragma region platform_linux
4488 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4489 // | START PLATFORM: LINUX |
4490 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4491 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_X11)
4492 namespace olc
4493 {
4494  class Platform_Linux : public olc::Platform
4495  {
4496  private:
4497  X11::Display* olc_Display = nullptr;
4498  X11::Window olc_WindowRoot;
4499  X11::Window olc_Window;
4500  X11::XVisualInfo* olc_VisualInfo;
4501  X11::Colormap olc_ColourMap;
4502  X11::XSetWindowAttributes olc_SetWindowAttribs;
4503 
4504  public:
4505  virtual olc::rcode ApplicationStartUp() override
4506  {
4507  return olc::rcode::OK;
4508  }
4509 
4510  virtual olc::rcode ApplicationCleanUp() override
4511  {
4512  XDestroyWindow(olc_Display, olc_Window);
4513  return olc::rcode::OK;
4514  }
4515 
4516  virtual olc::rcode ThreadStartUp() override
4517  {
4518  return olc::rcode::OK;
4519  }
4520 
4521  virtual olc::rcode ThreadCleanUp() override
4522  {
4523  renderer->DestroyDevice();
4524  return olc::OK;
4525  }
4526 
4527  virtual olc::rcode CreateGraphics(bool bFullScreen, bool bEnableVSYNC, const olc::vi2d& vViewPos, const olc::vi2d& vViewSize) override
4528  {
4529  if (renderer->CreateDevice({ olc_Display, &olc_Window, olc_VisualInfo }, bFullScreen, bEnableVSYNC) == olc::rcode::OK)
4530  {
4531  renderer->UpdateViewport(vViewPos, vViewSize);
4532  return olc::rcode::OK;
4533  }
4534  else
4535  return olc::rcode::FAIL;
4536  }
4537 
4538  virtual olc::rcode CreateWindowPane(const olc::vi2d& vWindowPos, olc::vi2d& vWindowSize, bool bFullScreen) override
4539  {
4540  using namespace X11;
4541  XInitThreads();
4542 
4543  // Grab the deafult display and window
4544  olc_Display = XOpenDisplay(NULL);
4545  olc_WindowRoot = DefaultRootWindow(olc_Display);
4546 
4547  // Based on the display capabilities, configure the appearance of the window
4548  GLint olc_GLAttribs[] = { GLX_RGBA, GLX_DEPTH_SIZE, 24, GLX_DOUBLEBUFFER, None };
4549  olc_VisualInfo = glXChooseVisual(olc_Display, 0, olc_GLAttribs);
4550  olc_ColourMap = XCreateColormap(olc_Display, olc_WindowRoot, olc_VisualInfo->visual, AllocNone);
4551  olc_SetWindowAttribs.colormap = olc_ColourMap;
4552 
4553  // Register which events we are interested in receiving
4554  olc_SetWindowAttribs.event_mask = ExposureMask | KeyPressMask | KeyReleaseMask |
4555  ButtonPressMask | ButtonReleaseMask | PointerMotionMask | FocusChangeMask | StructureNotifyMask;
4556 
4557  // Create the window
4558  olc_Window = XCreateWindow(olc_Display, olc_WindowRoot, vWindowPos.x, vWindowPos.y,
4559  vWindowSize.x, vWindowSize.y,
4560  0, olc_VisualInfo->depth, InputOutput, olc_VisualInfo->visual,
4561  CWColormap | CWEventMask, &olc_SetWindowAttribs);
4562 
4563  Atom wmDelete = XInternAtom(olc_Display, "WM_DELETE_WINDOW", true);
4564  XSetWMProtocols(olc_Display, olc_Window, &wmDelete, 1);
4565 
4566  XMapWindow(olc_Display, olc_Window);
4567  XStoreName(olc_Display, olc_Window, "OneLoneCoder.com - Pixel Game Engine");
4568 
4569  if (bFullScreen) // Thanks DragonEye, again :D
4570  {
4571  Atom wm_state;
4572  Atom fullscreen;
4573  wm_state = XInternAtom(olc_Display, "_NET_WM_STATE", False);
4574  fullscreen = XInternAtom(olc_Display, "_NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN", False);
4575  XEvent xev{ 0 };
4576  xev.type = ClientMessage;
4577  xev.xclient.window = olc_Window;
4578  xev.xclient.message_type = wm_state;
4579  xev.xclient.format = 32;
4580  xev.xclient.data.l[0] = (bFullScreen ? 1 : 0); // the action (0: off, 1: on, 2: toggle)
4581  xev.xclient.data.l[1] = fullscreen; // first property to alter
4582  xev.xclient.data.l[2] = 0; // second property to alter
4583  xev.xclient.data.l[3] = 0; // source indication
4584  XMapWindow(olc_Display, olc_Window);
4585  XSendEvent(olc_Display, DefaultRootWindow(olc_Display), False,
4586  SubstructureRedirectMask | SubstructureNotifyMask, &xev);
4587  XFlush(olc_Display);
4588  XWindowAttributes gwa;
4589  XGetWindowAttributes(olc_Display, olc_Window, &gwa);
4590  vWindowSize.x = gwa.width;
4591  vWindowSize.y = gwa.height;
4592  }
4593 
4594  // Create Keyboard Mapping
4595  mapKeys[0x00] = Key::NONE;
4596  mapKeys[0x61] = Key::A; mapKeys[0x62] = Key::B; mapKeys[0x63] = Key::C; mapKeys[0x64] = Key::D; mapKeys[0x65] = Key::E;
4597  mapKeys[0x66] = Key::F; mapKeys[0x67] = Key::G; mapKeys[0x68] = Key::H; mapKeys[0x69] = Key::I; mapKeys[0x6A] = Key::J;
4598  mapKeys[0x6B] = Key::K; mapKeys[0x6C] = Key::L; mapKeys[0x6D] = Key::M; mapKeys[0x6E] = Key::N; mapKeys[0x6F] = Key::O;
4599  mapKeys[0x70] = Key::P; mapKeys[0x71] = Key::Q; mapKeys[0x72] = Key::R; mapKeys[0x73] = Key::S; mapKeys[0x74] = Key::T;
4600  mapKeys[0x75] = Key::U; mapKeys[0x76] = Key::V; mapKeys[0x77] = Key::W; mapKeys[0x78] = Key::X; mapKeys[0x79] = Key::Y;
4601  mapKeys[0x7A] = Key::Z;
4602 
4603  mapKeys[XK_F1] = Key::F1; mapKeys[XK_F2] = Key::F2; mapKeys[XK_F3] = Key::F3; mapKeys[XK_F4] = Key::F4;
4604  mapKeys[XK_F5] = Key::F5; mapKeys[XK_F6] = Key::F6; mapKeys[XK_F7] = Key::F7; mapKeys[XK_F8] = Key::F8;
4605  mapKeys[XK_F9] = Key::F9; mapKeys[XK_F10] = Key::F10; mapKeys[XK_F11] = Key::F11; mapKeys[XK_F12] = Key::F12;
4606 
4607  mapKeys[XK_Down] = Key::DOWN; mapKeys[XK_Left] = Key::LEFT; mapKeys[XK_Right] = Key::RIGHT; mapKeys[XK_Up] = Key::UP;
4608  mapKeys[XK_KP_Enter] = Key::ENTER; mapKeys[XK_Return] = Key::ENTER;
4609 
4610  mapKeys[XK_BackSpace] = Key::BACK; mapKeys[XK_Escape] = Key::ESCAPE; mapKeys[XK_Linefeed] = Key::ENTER; mapKeys[XK_Pause] = Key::PAUSE;
4611  mapKeys[XK_Scroll_Lock] = Key::SCROLL; mapKeys[XK_Tab] = Key::TAB; mapKeys[XK_Delete] = Key::DEL; mapKeys[XK_Home] = Key::HOME;
4612  mapKeys[XK_End] = Key::END; mapKeys[XK_Page_Up] = Key::PGUP; mapKeys[XK_Page_Down] = Key::PGDN; mapKeys[XK_Insert] = Key::INS;
4613  mapKeys[XK_Shift_L] = Key::SHIFT; mapKeys[XK_Shift_R] = Key::SHIFT; mapKeys[XK_Control_L] = Key::CTRL; mapKeys[XK_Control_R] = Key::CTRL;
4614  mapKeys[XK_space] = Key::SPACE; mapKeys[XK_period] = Key::PERIOD;
4615 
4616  mapKeys[XK_0] = Key::K0; mapKeys[XK_1] = Key::K1; mapKeys[XK_2] = Key::K2; mapKeys[XK_3] = Key::K3; mapKeys[XK_4] = Key::K4;
4617  mapKeys[XK_5] = Key::K5; mapKeys[XK_6] = Key::K6; mapKeys[XK_7] = Key::K7; mapKeys[XK_8] = Key::K8; mapKeys[XK_9] = Key::K9;
4618 
4619  mapKeys[XK_KP_0] = Key::NP0; mapKeys[XK_KP_1] = Key::NP1; mapKeys[XK_KP_2] = Key::NP2; mapKeys[XK_KP_3] = Key::NP3; mapKeys[XK_KP_4] = Key::NP4;
4620  mapKeys[XK_KP_5] = Key::NP5; mapKeys[XK_KP_6] = Key::NP6; mapKeys[XK_KP_7] = Key::NP7; mapKeys[XK_KP_8] = Key::NP8; mapKeys[XK_KP_9] = Key::NP9;
4621  mapKeys[XK_KP_Multiply] = Key::NP_MUL; mapKeys[XK_KP_Add] = Key::NP_ADD; mapKeys[XK_KP_Divide] = Key::NP_DIV; mapKeys[XK_KP_Subtract] = Key::NP_SUB; mapKeys[XK_KP_Decimal] = Key::NP_DECIMAL;
4622 
4623  // These keys vary depending on the keyboard. I've included comments for US and UK keyboard layouts
4624  mapKeys[XK_semicolon] = Key::OEM_1; // On US and UK keyboards this is the ';:' key
4625  mapKeys[XK_slash] = Key::OEM_2; // On US and UK keyboards this is the '/?' key
4626  mapKeys[XK_asciitilde] = Key::OEM_3; // On US keyboard this is the '~' key
4627  mapKeys[XK_bracketleft] = Key::OEM_4; // On US and UK keyboards this is the '[{' key
4628  mapKeys[XK_backslash] = Key::OEM_5; // On US keyboard this is '\|' key.
4629  mapKeys[XK_bracketright] = Key::OEM_6; // On US and UK keyboards this is the ']}' key
4630  mapKeys[XK_apostrophe] = Key::OEM_7; // On US keyboard this is the single/double quote key. On UK, this is the single quote/@ symbol key
4631  mapKeys[XK_numbersign] = Key::OEM_8; // miscellaneous characters. Varies by keyboard. I believe this to be the '#~' key on UK keyboards
4632  mapKeys[XK_equal] = Key::EQUALS; // the '+' key on any keyboard
4633  mapKeys[XK_comma] = Key::COMMA; // the comma key on any keyboard
4634  mapKeys[XK_minus] = Key::MINUS; // the minus key on any keyboard
4635 
4636  mapKeys[XK_Caps_Lock] = Key::CAPS_LOCK;
4637 
4638  return olc::OK;
4639  }
4640 
4641  virtual olc::rcode SetWindowTitle(const std::string& s) override
4642  {
4643  X11::XStoreName(olc_Display, olc_Window, s.c_str());
4644  return olc::OK;
4645  }
4646 
4647  virtual olc::rcode StartSystemEventLoop() override
4648  {
4649  return olc::OK;
4650  }
4651 
4652  virtual olc::rcode HandleSystemEvent() override
4653  {
4654  using namespace X11;
4655  // Handle Xlib Message Loop - we do this in the
4656  // same thread that OpenGL was created so we dont
4657  // need to worry too much about multithreading with X11
4658  XEvent xev;
4659  while (XPending(olc_Display))
4660  {
4661  XNextEvent(olc_Display, &xev);
4662  if (xev.type == Expose)
4663  {
4664  XWindowAttributes gwa;
4665  XGetWindowAttributes(olc_Display, olc_Window, &gwa);
4666  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateWindowSize(gwa.width, gwa.height);
4667  }
4668  else if (xev.type == ConfigureNotify)
4669  {
4670  XConfigureEvent xce = xev.xconfigure;
4671  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateWindowSize(xce.width, xce.height);
4672  }
4673  else if (xev.type == KeyPress)
4674  {
4675  KeySym sym = XLookupKeysym(&xev.xkey, 0);
4676  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[sym], true);
4677  XKeyEvent* e = (XKeyEvent*)&xev; // Because DragonEye loves numpads
4678  XLookupString(e, NULL, 0, &sym, NULL);
4679  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[sym], true);
4680  }
4681  else if (xev.type == KeyRelease)
4682  {
4683  KeySym sym = XLookupKeysym(&xev.xkey, 0);
4684  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[sym], false);
4685  XKeyEvent* e = (XKeyEvent*)&xev;
4686  XLookupString(e, NULL, 0, &sym, NULL);
4687  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[sym], false);
4688  }
4689  else if (xev.type == ButtonPress)
4690  {
4691  switch (xev.xbutton.button)
4692  {
4693  case 1: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, true); break;
4694  case 2: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, true); break;
4695  case 3: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, true); break;
4696  case 4: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseWheel(120); break;
4697  case 5: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseWheel(-120); break;
4698  default: break;
4699  }
4700  }
4701  else if (xev.type == ButtonRelease)
4702  {
4703  switch (xev.xbutton.button)
4704  {
4705  case 1: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, false); break;
4706  case 2: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, false); break;
4707  case 3: ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, false); break;
4708  default: break;
4709  }
4710  }
4711  else if (xev.type == MotionNotify)
4712  {
4713  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouse(xev.xmotion.x, xev.xmotion.y);
4714  }
4715  else if (xev.type == FocusIn)
4716  {
4717  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(true);
4718  }
4719  else if (xev.type == FocusOut)
4720  {
4721  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(false);
4722  }
4723  else if (xev.type == ClientMessage)
4724  {
4725  ptrPGE->olc_Terminate();
4726  }
4727  }
4728  return olc::OK;
4729  }
4730  };
4731 }
4732 #endif
4733 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4734 // | END PLATFORM: LINUX |
4735 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4736 #pragma endregion
4737 
4738 #pragma region platform_glut
4739 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4740 // | START PLATFORM: GLUT (used to make it simple for Apple) |
4741 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4742 //
4743 // VERY IMPORTANT!!! The Apple port was originally created by @Mumflr (discord)
4744 // and the repo for the development of this project can be found here:
4745 // https://github.com/MumflrFumperdink/olcPGEMac which contains maccy goodness
4746 // and support on how to setup your build environment.
4747 //
4748 // "MASSIVE MASSIVE THANKS TO MUMFLR" - Javidx9
4749 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_GLUT)
4750 namespace olc {
4751 
4752  class Platform_GLUT : public olc::Platform
4753  {
4754  public:
4755  static std::atomic<bool>* bActiveRef;
4756 
4757  virtual olc::rcode ApplicationStartUp() override {
4758  return olc::rcode::OK;
4759  }
4760 
4761  virtual olc::rcode ApplicationCleanUp() override
4762  {
4763  return olc::rcode::OK;
4764  }
4765 
4766  virtual olc::rcode ThreadStartUp() override
4767  {
4768  return olc::rcode::OK;
4769  }
4770 
4771  virtual olc::rcode ThreadCleanUp() override
4772  {
4773  renderer->DestroyDevice();
4774  return olc::OK;
4775  }
4776 
4777  virtual olc::rcode CreateGraphics(bool bFullScreen, bool bEnableVSYNC, const olc::vi2d& vViewPos, const olc::vi2d& vViewSize) override
4778  {
4779  if (renderer->CreateDevice({}, bFullScreen, bEnableVSYNC) == olc::rcode::OK)
4780  {
4781  renderer->UpdateViewport(vViewPos, vViewSize);
4782  return olc::rcode::OK;
4783  }
4784  else
4785  return olc::rcode::FAIL;
4786  }
4787 
4788  static void ExitMainLoop() {
4789  if (!ptrPGE->OnUserDestroy()) {
4790  *bActiveRef = true;
4791  return;
4792  }
4793  platform->ThreadCleanUp();
4794  platform->ApplicationCleanUp();
4795  exit(0);
4796  }
4797 
4798  static void ThreadFunct() {
4799  if (!*bActiveRef) {
4800  ExitMainLoop();
4801  return;
4802  }
4803  glutPostRedisplay();
4804  }
4805 
4806  static void DrawFunct() {
4807  ptrPGE->olc_CoreUpdate();
4808  }
4809 
4810  virtual olc::rcode CreateWindowPane(const olc::vi2d& vWindowPos, olc::vi2d& vWindowSize, bool bFullScreen) override
4811  {
4812  renderer->PrepareDevice();
4813 
4814 
4815  if (bFullScreen)
4816  {
4817  vWindowSize.x = glutGet(GLUT_SCREEN_WIDTH);
4818  vWindowSize.y = glutGet(GLUT_SCREEN_HEIGHT);
4819  glutFullScreen();
4820  }
4821 
4822  if (vWindowSize.x > glutGet(GLUT_SCREEN_WIDTH) || vWindowSize.y > glutGet(GLUT_SCREEN_HEIGHT)) {
4823  perror("ERROR: The specified window dimensions do not fit on your screen\n");
4824  return olc::FAIL;
4825  }
4826 
4827  // Create Keyboard Mapping
4828  mapKeys[0x00] = Key::NONE;
4829  mapKeys['A'] = Key::A; mapKeys['B'] = Key::B; mapKeys['C'] = Key::C; mapKeys['D'] = Key::D; mapKeys['E'] = Key::E;
4830  mapKeys['F'] = Key::F; mapKeys['G'] = Key::G; mapKeys['H'] = Key::H; mapKeys['I'] = Key::I; mapKeys['J'] = Key::J;
4831  mapKeys['K'] = Key::K; mapKeys['L'] = Key::L; mapKeys['M'] = Key::M; mapKeys['N'] = Key::N; mapKeys['O'] = Key::O;
4832  mapKeys['P'] = Key::P; mapKeys['Q'] = Key::Q; mapKeys['R'] = Key::R; mapKeys['S'] = Key::S; mapKeys['T'] = Key::T;
4833  mapKeys['U'] = Key::U; mapKeys['V'] = Key::V; mapKeys['W'] = Key::W; mapKeys['X'] = Key::X; mapKeys['Y'] = Key::Y;
4834  mapKeys['Z'] = Key::Z;
4835 
4836  mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F1] = Key::F1; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F2] = Key::F2; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F3] = Key::F3; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F4] = Key::F4;
4837  mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F5] = Key::F5; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F6] = Key::F6; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F7] = Key::F7; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F8] = Key::F8;
4838  mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F9] = Key::F9; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F10] = Key::F10; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F11] = Key::F11; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_F12] = Key::F12;
4839 
4840  mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_DOWN] = Key::DOWN; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_LEFT] = Key::LEFT; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_RIGHT] = Key::RIGHT; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_UP] = Key::UP;
4841  mapKeys[13] = Key::ENTER;
4842 
4843  mapKeys[127] = Key::BACK; mapKeys[27] = Key::ESCAPE;
4844  mapKeys[9] = Key::TAB; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_HOME] = Key::HOME;
4845  mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_END] = Key::END; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_PAGE_UP] = Key::PGUP; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_PAGE_DOWN] = Key::PGDN; mapKeys[GLUT_KEY_INSERT] = Key::INS;
4846  mapKeys[32] = Key::SPACE; mapKeys[46] = Key::PERIOD;
4847 
4848  mapKeys[48] = Key::K0; mapKeys[49] = Key::K1; mapKeys[50] = Key::K2; mapKeys[51] = Key::K3; mapKeys[52] = Key::K4;
4849  mapKeys[53] = Key::K5; mapKeys[54] = Key::K6; mapKeys[55] = Key::K7; mapKeys[56] = Key::K8; mapKeys[57] = Key::K9;
4850 
4851  // NOTE: MISSING KEYS :O
4852 
4853  glutKeyboardFunc([](unsigned char key, int x, int y) -> void {
4854  switch (glutGetModifiers()) {
4855  case 0: //This is when there are no modifiers
4856  if ('a' <= key && key <= 'z') key -= 32;
4857  break;
4858  case GLUT_ACTIVE_SHIFT:
4859  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(Key::SHIFT, true);
4860  break;
4861  case GLUT_ACTIVE_CTRL:
4862  if ('a' <= key && key <= 'z') key -= 32;
4863  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(Key::CTRL, true);
4864  break;
4865  case GLUT_ACTIVE_ALT:
4866  if ('a' <= key && key <= 'z') key -= 32;
4867  break;
4868  }
4869 
4870  if (mapKeys[key])
4871  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[key], true);
4872  });
4873 
4874  glutKeyboardUpFunc([](unsigned char key, int x, int y) -> void {
4875  switch (glutGetModifiers()) {
4876  case 0: //This is when there are no modifiers
4877  if ('a' <= key && key <= 'z') key -= 32;
4878  break;
4879  case GLUT_ACTIVE_SHIFT:
4880  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(Key::SHIFT, false);
4881  break;
4882  case GLUT_ACTIVE_CTRL:
4883  if ('a' <= key && key <= 'z') key -= 32;
4884  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(Key::CTRL, false);
4885  break;
4886  case GLUT_ACTIVE_ALT:
4887  if ('a' <= key && key <= 'z') key -= 32;
4888  //No ALT in PGE
4889  break;
4890  }
4891 
4892  if (mapKeys[key])
4893  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[key], false);
4894  });
4895 
4896  //Special keys
4897  glutSpecialFunc([](int key, int x, int y) -> void {
4898  if (mapKeys[key])
4899  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[key], true);
4900  });
4901 
4902  glutSpecialUpFunc([](int key, int x, int y) -> void {
4903  if (mapKeys[key])
4904  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[key], false);
4905  });
4906 
4907  glutMouseFunc([](int button, int state, int x, int y) -> void {
4908  switch (button) {
4909  case GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON:
4910  if (state == GLUT_UP) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, false);
4911  else if (state == GLUT_DOWN) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, true);
4912  break;
4913  case GLUT_MIDDLE_BUTTON:
4914  if (state == GLUT_UP) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, false);
4915  else if (state == GLUT_DOWN) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, true);
4916  break;
4917  case GLUT_RIGHT_BUTTON:
4918  if (state == GLUT_UP) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, false);
4919  else if (state == GLUT_DOWN) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, true);
4920  break;
4921  }
4922  });
4923 
4924  auto mouseMoveCall = [](int x, int y) -> void {
4925  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouse(x, y);
4926  };
4927 
4928  glutMotionFunc(mouseMoveCall);
4929  glutPassiveMotionFunc(mouseMoveCall);
4930 
4931  glutEntryFunc([](int state) -> void {
4932  if (state == GLUT_ENTERED) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(true);
4933  else if (state == GLUT_LEFT) ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(false);
4934  });
4935 
4936  glutDisplayFunc(DrawFunct);
4937  glutIdleFunc(ThreadFunct);
4938 
4939  return olc::OK;
4940  }
4941 
4942  virtual olc::rcode SetWindowTitle(const std::string& s) override
4943  {
4944  glutSetWindowTitle(s.c_str());
4945  return olc::OK;
4946  }
4947 
4948  virtual olc::rcode StartSystemEventLoop() override {
4949  glutMainLoop();
4950  return olc::OK;
4951  }
4952 
4953  virtual olc::rcode HandleSystemEvent() override
4954  {
4955  return olc::OK;
4956  }
4957  };
4958 
4959  std::atomic<bool>* Platform_GLUT::bActiveRef{ nullptr };
4960 
4961  //Custom Start
4962  olc::rcode PixelGameEngine::Start()
4963  {
4964  if (platform->ApplicationStartUp() != olc::OK) return olc::FAIL;
4965 
4966  // Construct the window
4967  if (platform->CreateWindowPane({ 30,30 }, vWindowSize, bFullScreen) != olc::OK) return olc::FAIL;
4968  olc_UpdateWindowSize(vWindowSize.x, vWindowSize.y);
4969 
4970 
4971  if (platform->ThreadStartUp() == olc::FAIL) return olc::FAIL;
4972 
4973  olc_PrepareEngine();
4974 
4975  if (!OnUserCreate()) return olc::FAIL;
4976 
4977  Platform_GLUT::bActiveRef = &bAtomActive;
4978 
4979  glutWMCloseFunc(Platform_GLUT::ExitMainLoop);
4980 
4981  bAtomActive = true;
4982 
4983  platform->StartSystemEventLoop();
4984 
4985  //This code will not even be run but why not
4986  if (platform->ApplicationCleanUp() != olc::OK) return olc::FAIL;
4987 
4988  return olc::OK;
4989  }
4990 }
4991 
4992 #endif
4993 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4994 // | END PLATFORM: GLUT |
4995 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
4996 #pragma endregion
4997 
4998 
4999 #pragma region platform_emscripten
5000 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5001 // | START PLATFORM: Emscripten - Totally Game Changing... |
5002 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5003 
5004 //
5005 // Firstly a big mega thank you to members of the OLC Community for sorting this
5006 // out. Making a browser compatible version has been a priority for quite some
5007 // time, but I lacked the expertise to do it. This awesome feature is possible
5008 // because a group of former strangers got together and formed friendships over
5009 // their shared passion for code. If anything demonstrates how powerful helping
5010 // each other can be, it's this. - Javidx9
5011 
5012 // Emscripten Platform: MaGetzUb, Moros1138, Slavka, Dandistine, Gorbit99, Bispoo
5013 // also: Ishidex, Gusgo99, SlicEnDicE, Alexio
5014 
5015 
5016 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_EMSCRIPTEN)
5017 
5018 #include <emscripten/html5.h>
5019 #include <emscripten/key_codes.h>
5020 
5021 extern "C"
5022 {
5023  EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE inline int olc_OnPageUnload()
5024  { olc::platform->ApplicationCleanUp(); return 0; }
5025 }
5026 
5027 namespace olc
5028 {
5029  class Platform_Emscripten : public olc::Platform
5030  {
5031  public:
5032 
5033  virtual olc::rcode ApplicationStartUp() override
5034  { return olc::rcode::OK; }
5035 
5036  virtual olc::rcode ApplicationCleanUp() override
5037  { ThreadCleanUp(); return olc::rcode::OK; }
5038 
5039  virtual olc::rcode ThreadStartUp() override
5040  { return olc::rcode::OK; }
5041 
5042  virtual olc::rcode ThreadCleanUp() override
5043  { renderer->DestroyDevice(); return olc::OK; }
5044 
5045  virtual olc::rcode CreateGraphics(bool bFullScreen, bool bEnableVSYNC, const olc::vi2d& vViewPos, const olc::vi2d& vViewSize) override
5046  {
5047  if (renderer->CreateDevice({}, bFullScreen, bEnableVSYNC) == olc::rcode::OK)
5048  {
5049  renderer->UpdateViewport(vViewPos, vViewSize);
5050  return olc::rcode::OK;
5051  }
5052  else
5053  return olc::rcode::FAIL;
5054  }
5055 
5056  virtual olc::rcode CreateWindowPane(const olc::vi2d& vWindowPos, olc::vi2d& vWindowSize, bool bFullScreen) override
5057  {
5058  emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", vWindowSize.x, vWindowSize.y);
5059 
5060  mapKeys[DOM_PK_UNKNOWN] = Key::NONE;
5061  mapKeys[DOM_PK_A] = Key::A; mapKeys[DOM_PK_B] = Key::B; mapKeys[DOM_PK_C] = Key::C; mapKeys[DOM_PK_D] = Key::D;
5062  mapKeys[DOM_PK_E] = Key::E; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F] = Key::F; mapKeys[DOM_PK_G] = Key::G; mapKeys[DOM_PK_H] = Key::H;
5063  mapKeys[DOM_PK_I] = Key::I; mapKeys[DOM_PK_J] = Key::J; mapKeys[DOM_PK_K] = Key::K; mapKeys[DOM_PK_L] = Key::L;
5064  mapKeys[DOM_PK_M] = Key::M; mapKeys[DOM_PK_N] = Key::N; mapKeys[DOM_PK_O] = Key::O; mapKeys[DOM_PK_P] = Key::P;
5065  mapKeys[DOM_PK_Q] = Key::Q; mapKeys[DOM_PK_R] = Key::R; mapKeys[DOM_PK_S] = Key::S; mapKeys[DOM_PK_T] = Key::T;
5066  mapKeys[DOM_PK_U] = Key::U; mapKeys[DOM_PK_V] = Key::V; mapKeys[DOM_PK_W] = Key::W; mapKeys[DOM_PK_X] = Key::X;
5067  mapKeys[DOM_PK_Y] = Key::Y; mapKeys[DOM_PK_Z] = Key::Z;
5068  mapKeys[DOM_PK_0] = Key::K0; mapKeys[DOM_PK_1] = Key::K1; mapKeys[DOM_PK_2] = Key::K2;
5069  mapKeys[DOM_PK_3] = Key::K3; mapKeys[DOM_PK_4] = Key::K4; mapKeys[DOM_PK_5] = Key::K5;
5070  mapKeys[DOM_PK_6] = Key::K6; mapKeys[DOM_PK_7] = Key::K7; mapKeys[DOM_PK_8] = Key::K8;
5071  mapKeys[DOM_PK_9] = Key::K9;
5072  mapKeys[DOM_PK_F1] = Key::F1; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F2] = Key::F2; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F3] = Key::F3; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F4] = Key::F4;
5073  mapKeys[DOM_PK_F5] = Key::F5; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F6] = Key::F6; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F7] = Key::F7; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F8] = Key::F8;
5074  mapKeys[DOM_PK_F9] = Key::F9; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F10] = Key::F10; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F11] = Key::F11; mapKeys[DOM_PK_F12] = Key::F12;
5075  mapKeys[DOM_PK_ARROW_UP] = Key::UP; mapKeys[DOM_PK_ARROW_DOWN] = Key::DOWN;
5076  mapKeys[DOM_PK_ARROW_LEFT] = Key::LEFT; mapKeys[DOM_PK_ARROW_RIGHT] = Key::RIGHT;
5077  mapKeys[DOM_PK_SPACE] = Key::SPACE; mapKeys[DOM_PK_TAB] = Key::TAB;
5078  mapKeys[DOM_PK_SHIFT_LEFT] = Key::SHIFT; mapKeys[DOM_PK_SHIFT_RIGHT] = Key::SHIFT;
5079  mapKeys[DOM_PK_CONTROL_LEFT] = Key::CTRL; mapKeys[DOM_PK_CONTROL_RIGHT] = Key::CTRL;
5080  mapKeys[DOM_PK_INSERT] = Key::INS; mapKeys[DOM_PK_DELETE] = Key::DEL; mapKeys[DOM_PK_HOME] = Key::HOME;
5081  mapKeys[DOM_PK_END] = Key::END; mapKeys[DOM_PK_PAGE_UP] = Key::PGUP; mapKeys[DOM_PK_PAGE_DOWN] = Key::PGDN;
5082  mapKeys[DOM_PK_BACKSPACE] = Key::BACK; mapKeys[DOM_PK_ESCAPE] = Key::ESCAPE;
5083  mapKeys[DOM_PK_ENTER] = Key::ENTER; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_EQUAL] = Key::EQUALS;
5084  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_ENTER] = Key::ENTER; mapKeys[DOM_PK_PAUSE] = Key::PAUSE;
5085  mapKeys[DOM_PK_SCROLL_LOCK] = Key::SCROLL;
5086  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_0] = Key::NP0; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_1] = Key::NP1; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_2] = Key::NP2;
5087  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_3] = Key::NP3; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_4] = Key::NP4; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_5] = Key::NP5;
5088  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_6] = Key::NP6; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_7] = Key::NP7; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_8] = Key::NP8;
5089  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_9] = Key::NP9;
5090  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_MULTIPLY] = Key::NP_MUL; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_DIVIDE] = Key::NP_DIV;
5091  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_ADD] = Key::NP_ADD; mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_SUBTRACT] = Key::NP_SUB;
5092  mapKeys[DOM_PK_NUMPAD_DECIMAL] = Key::NP_DECIMAL;
5093  mapKeys[DOM_PK_PERIOD] = Key::PERIOD; mapKeys[DOM_PK_EQUAL] = Key::EQUALS;
5094  mapKeys[DOM_PK_COMMA] = Key::COMMA; mapKeys[DOM_PK_MINUS] = Key::MINUS;
5095  mapKeys[DOM_PK_CAPS_LOCK] = Key::CAPS_LOCK;
5096  mapKeys[DOM_PK_SEMICOLON] = Key::OEM_1; mapKeys[DOM_PK_SLASH] = Key::OEM_2; mapKeys[DOM_PK_BACKQUOTE] = Key::OEM_3;
5097  mapKeys[DOM_PK_BRACKET_LEFT] = Key::OEM_4; mapKeys[DOM_PK_BACKSLASH] = Key::OEM_5; mapKeys[DOM_PK_BRACKET_RIGHT] = Key::OEM_6;
5098  mapKeys[DOM_PK_QUOTE] = Key::OEM_7; mapKeys[DOM_PK_BACKSLASH] = Key::OEM_8;
5099 
5100  // Keyboard Callbacks
5101  emscripten_set_keydown_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, keyboard_callback);
5102  emscripten_set_keyup_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, keyboard_callback);
5103 
5104  // Mouse Callbacks
5105  emscripten_set_wheel_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, wheel_callback);
5106  emscripten_set_mousedown_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, mouse_callback);
5107  emscripten_set_mouseup_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, mouse_callback);
5108  emscripten_set_mousemove_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, mouse_callback);
5109 
5110  // Touch Callbacks
5111  emscripten_set_touchstart_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, touch_callback);
5112  emscripten_set_touchmove_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, touch_callback);
5113  emscripten_set_touchend_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, touch_callback);
5114 
5115  // Canvas Focus Callbacks
5116  emscripten_set_blur_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, focus_callback);
5117  emscripten_set_focus_callback("#canvas", 0, 1, focus_callback);
5118 
5119 #pragma warning disable format
5120  EM_ASM( window.onunload = Module._olc_OnPageUnload; );
5121 
5122  // IMPORTANT! - Sorry About This...
5123  //
5124  // In order to handle certain browser based events, such as resizing and
5125  // going to full screen, we have to effectively inject code into the container
5126  // running the PGE. Yes, I vomited about 11 times too when the others were
5127  // convincing me this is the future. Well, this isnt the future, and if it
5128  // were to be, I want no part of what must be a miserable distopian free
5129  // for all of anarchic code injection to get rudimentary events like "Resize()".
5130  //
5131  // Wake up people! Of course theres a spoon. There has to be to keep feeding
5132  // the giant web baby.
5133 
5134 
5135  // Fullscreen and Resize Observers
5136  EM_ASM({
5137 
5138  // cache for reuse
5139  Module._olc_EmscriptenShellCss = "width: 100%; height: 70vh; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;";
5140 
5141  // width / height = aspect ratio
5142  Module._olc_WindowAspectRatio = $0 / $1;
5143  Module.canvas.parentNode.addEventListener("resize", (e) => {
5144 
5145  if (e.defaultPrevented) { e.stopPropagation(); return; }
5146  var viewWidth = e.detail.width;
5147  var viewHeight = e.detail.width / Module._olc_WindowAspectRatio;
5148  if (viewHeight > e.detail.height)
5149  {
5150  viewHeight = e.detail.height;
5151  viewWidth = e.detail.height * Module._olc_WindowAspectRatio;
5152  }
5153 
5154  if (Module.canvas.parentNode.className == 'emscripten_border')
5155  Module.canvas.parentNode.style.cssText = Module._olc_EmscriptenShellCss + " width: " + viewWidth.toString() + "px; height: " + viewHeight.toString() + "px;";
5156 
5157  Module.canvas.setAttribute("width", viewWidth);
5158  Module.canvas.setAttribute("height", viewHeight);
5159 
5160  if (document.fullscreenElement != null)
5161  {
5162  var top = (e.detail.height - viewHeight) / 2;
5163  var left = (e.detail.width - viewWidth) / 2;
5164  Module.canvas.style.position = "fixed";
5165  Module.canvas.style.top = top.toString() + "px";
5166  Module.canvas.style.left = left.toString() + "px";
5167  Module.canvas.style.width = "";
5168  Module.canvas.style.height = "";
5169  }
5170 
5171  // trigger PGE update
5172  Module._olc_PGE_UpdateWindowSize(viewWidth, viewHeight);
5173  // this is really only needed when enter/exiting fullscreen
5174  Module.canvas.focus();
5175  // prevent this event from ever affecting the document beyond this element
5176  e.stopPropagation();
5177  });
5178 
5179  // helper function to prevent repeating the same code everywhere
5180  Module._olc_ResizeCanvas = () =>
5181  {
5182  // yes, we still have to wait, sigh..
5183  setTimeout(() =>
5184  {
5185  // if default template, stretch width as well
5186  if (Module.canvas.parentNode.className == 'emscripten_border')
5187  Module.canvas.parentNode.style.cssText = Module._olc_EmscriptenShellCss;
5188 
5189  // override it's styling so we can get it's stretched size
5190  Module.canvas.style.cssText = "width: 100%; height: 100%; outline: none;";
5191 
5192  // setup custom resize event
5193  var resizeEvent = new CustomEvent('resize',
5194  {
5195  detail: {
5196  width: Module.canvas.clientWidth,
5197  height : Module.canvas.clientHeight
5198  },
5199  bubbles : true,
5200  cancelable : true
5201  });
5202 
5203  // trigger custom resize event on canvas element
5204  Module.canvas.dispatchEvent(resizeEvent);
5205  }, 50);
5206  };
5207 
5208 
5209  // Disable Refresh Gesture on mobile
5210  document.body.style.cssText += " overscroll-behavior-y: contain;";
5211 
5212  if (Module.canvas.parentNode.className == 'emscripten_border')
5213  {
5214  // force body to have no margin in emscripten's minimal shell
5215  document.body.style.margin = "0";
5216  Module.canvas.parentNode.style.cssText = Module._olc_EmscriptenShellCss;
5217  }
5218 
5219  Module._olc_ResizeCanvas();
5220 
5221  // observe and react to resizing of the container element
5222  var resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {Module._olc_ResizeCanvas();}).observe(Module.canvas.parentNode);
5223 
5224  // observe and react to changes that occur when entering/exiting fullscreen
5225  var mutationObserver = new MutationObserver((mutationsList, observer) =>
5226  {
5227  // a change has occurred, let's check them out!
5228  for (var i = 0; i < mutationsList.length; i++)
5229  {
5230  // cycle through all of the newly added elements
5231  for (var j = 0; j < mutationsList[i].addedNodes.length; j++)
5232  {
5233  // if this element is a our canvas, trigger resize
5234  if (mutationsList[i].addedNodes[j].id == 'canvas')
5235  Module._olc_ResizeCanvas();
5236  }
5237  }
5238  }).observe(Module.canvas.parentNode,
5239  {
5240  attributes: false,
5241  childList : true,
5242  subtree : false
5243  });
5244 
5245  // add resize listener on window
5246  window.addEventListener("resize", (e) => { Module._olc_ResizeCanvas(); });
5247 
5248  }, vWindowSize.x, vWindowSize.y); // Fullscreen and Resize Observers
5249 #pragma warning restore format
5250  return olc::rcode::OK;
5251  }
5252 
5253  // Interface PGE's UpdateWindowSize, for use in Javascript
5254  void UpdateWindowSize(int width, int height)
5255  {
5256  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateWindowSize(width, height);
5257  }
5258 
5259  //TY Gorbit
5260  static EM_BOOL focus_callback(int eventType, const EmscriptenFocusEvent* focusEvent, void* userData)
5261  {
5262  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_BLUR)
5263  {
5264  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(false);
5265  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseFocus(false);
5266  }
5267  else if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_FOCUS)
5268  {
5269  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyFocus(true);
5270  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseFocus(true);
5271  }
5272 
5273  return 0;
5274  }
5275 
5276  //TY Moros
5277  static EM_BOOL keyboard_callback(int eventType, const EmscriptenKeyboardEvent* e, void* userData)
5278  {
5279  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_KEYDOWN)
5280  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[emscripten_compute_dom_pk_code(e->code)], true);
5281 
5282  // THANK GOD!! for this compute function. And thanks Dandistine for pointing it out!
5283  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_KEYUP)
5284  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateKeyState(mapKeys[emscripten_compute_dom_pk_code(e->code)], false);
5285 
5286  //Consume keyboard events so that keys like F1 and F5 don't do weird things
5287  return EM_TRUE;
5288  }
5289 
5290  //TY Moros
5291  static EM_BOOL wheel_callback(int eventType, const EmscriptenWheelEvent* e, void* userData)
5292  {
5293  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_WHEEL)
5294  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseWheel(-1 * e->deltaY);
5295 
5296  return EM_TRUE;
5297  }
5298 
5299  //TY Bispoo
5300  static EM_BOOL touch_callback(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* e, void* userData)
5301  {
5302  // Move
5303  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TOUCHMOVE)
5304  {
5305  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouse(e->touches->targetX, e->touches->targetY);
5306  }
5307 
5308  // Start
5309  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TOUCHSTART)
5310  {
5311  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouse(e->touches->targetX, e->touches->targetY);
5312  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, true);
5313  }
5314 
5315  // End
5316  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TOUCHEND)
5317  {
5318  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, false);
5319  }
5320 
5321  return EM_TRUE;
5322  }
5323 
5324  //TY Moros
5325  static EM_BOOL mouse_callback(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* e, void* userData)
5326  {
5327  //Mouse Movement
5328  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEMOVE)
5329  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouse(e->targetX, e->targetY);
5330 
5331 
5332  //Mouse button press
5333  if (e->button == 0) // left click
5334  {
5335  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEDOWN)
5336  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, true);
5337  else if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEUP)
5338  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(0, false);
5339  }
5340 
5341  if (e->button == 2) // right click
5342  {
5343  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEDOWN)
5344  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, true);
5345  else if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEUP)
5346  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(1, false);
5347 
5348  }
5349 
5350  if (e->button == 1) // middle click
5351  {
5352  if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEDOWN)
5353  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, true);
5354  else if (eventType == EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_MOUSEUP)
5355  ptrPGE->olc_UpdateMouseState(2, false);
5356 
5357  //at the moment only middle mouse needs to consume events.
5358  return EM_TRUE;
5359  }
5360 
5361  return EM_FALSE;
5362  }
5363 
5364 
5365  virtual olc::rcode SetWindowTitle(const std::string& s) override
5366  { emscripten_set_window_title(s.c_str()); return olc::OK; }
5367 
5368  virtual olc::rcode StartSystemEventLoop() override
5369  { return olc::OK; }
5370 
5371  virtual olc::rcode HandleSystemEvent() override
5372  { return olc::OK; }
5373 
5374  static void MainLoop()
5375  {
5376  olc::Platform::ptrPGE->olc_CoreUpdate();
5377  if (!ptrPGE->olc_IsRunning())
5378  {
5379  if (ptrPGE->OnUserDestroy())
5380  {
5381  emscripten_cancel_main_loop();
5382  platform->ApplicationCleanUp();
5383  }
5384  else
5385  {
5386  ptrPGE->olc_Reanimate();
5387  }
5388  }
5389  }
5390  };
5391 
5392  //Emscripten needs a special Start function
5393  //Much of this is usually done in EngineThread, but that isn't used here
5394  olc::rcode PixelGameEngine::Start()
5395  {
5396  if (platform->ApplicationStartUp() != olc::OK) return olc::FAIL;
5397 
5398  // Construct the window
5399  if (platform->CreateWindowPane({ 30,30 }, vWindowSize, bFullScreen) != olc::OK) return olc::FAIL;
5400  olc_UpdateWindowSize(vWindowSize.x, vWindowSize.y);
5401 
5402  // Some implementations may form an event loop here
5403  if (platform->ThreadStartUp() == olc::FAIL) return olc::FAIL;
5404 
5405  // Do engine context specific initialisation
5406  olc_PrepareEngine();
5407 
5408  // Consider the "thread" started
5409  bAtomActive = true;
5410 
5411  // Create user resources as part of this thread
5412  for (auto& ext : vExtensions) ext->OnBeforeUserCreate();
5413  if (!OnUserCreate()) bAtomActive = false;
5414  for (auto& ext : vExtensions) ext->OnAfterUserCreate();
5415 
5416  platform->StartSystemEventLoop();
5417 
5418  //This causes a heap memory corruption in Emscripten for some reason
5419  //Platform_Emscripten::bActiveRef = &bAtomActive;
5420  emscripten_set_main_loop(&Platform_Emscripten::MainLoop, 0, 1);
5421 
5422  // Wait for thread to be exited
5423  if (platform->ApplicationCleanUp() != olc::OK) return olc::FAIL;
5424  return olc::OK;
5425  }
5426 }
5427 
5428 extern "C"
5429 {
5430  EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE inline void olc_PGE_UpdateWindowSize(int width, int height)
5431  {
5432  emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", width, height);
5433  // Thanks slavka
5434  ((olc::Platform_Emscripten*)olc::platform.get())->UpdateWindowSize(width, height);
5435  }
5436 }
5437 
5438 #endif
5439 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5440 // | END PLATFORM: Emscripten |
5441 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5442 #pragma endregion
5443 
5444 
5445 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5446 // | olcPixelGameEngine Auto-Configuration |
5447 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5448 #pragma region pge_config
5449 namespace olc
5450 {
5451  void PixelGameEngine::olc_ConfigureSystem()
5452  {
5453 
5454 #if defined(OLC_IMAGE_GDI)
5455  olc::Sprite::loader = std::make_unique<olc::ImageLoader_GDIPlus>();
5456 #endif
5457 
5458 #if defined(OLC_IMAGE_LIBPNG)
5459  olc::Sprite::loader = std::make_unique<olc::ImageLoader_LibPNG>();
5460 #endif
5461 
5462 #if defined(OLC_IMAGE_STB)
5463  olc::Sprite::loader = std::make_unique<olc::ImageLoader_STB>();
5464 #endif
5465 
5466 #if defined(OLC_IMAGE_CUSTOM_EX)
5467  olc::Sprite::loader = std::make_unique<OLC_IMAGE_CUSTOM_EX>();
5468 #endif
5469 
5470 
5471 
5472 
5473 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_WINAPI)
5474  platform = std::make_unique<olc::Platform_Windows>();
5475 #endif
5476 
5477 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_X11)
5478  platform = std::make_unique<olc::Platform_Linux>();
5479 #endif
5480 
5481 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_GLUT)
5482  platform = std::make_unique<olc::Platform_GLUT>();
5483 #endif
5484 
5485 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_EMSCRIPTEN)
5486  platform = std::make_unique<olc::Platform_Emscripten>();
5487 #endif
5488 
5489 #if defined(OLC_PLATFORM_CUSTOM_EX)
5490  platform = std::make_unique<OLC_PLATFORM_CUSTOM_EX>();
5491 #endif
5492 
5493 
5494 
5495 #if defined(OLC_GFX_OPENGL10)
5496  renderer = std::make_unique<olc::Renderer_OGL10>();
5497 #endif
5498 
5499 #if defined(OLC_GFX_OPENGL33)
5500  renderer = std::make_unique<olc::Renderer_OGL33>();
5501 #endif
5502 
5503 #if defined(OLC_GFX_OPENGLES2)
5504  renderer = std::make_unique<olc::Renderer_OGLES2>();
5505 #endif
5506 
5507 #if defined(OLC_GFX_DIRECTX10)
5508  renderer = std::make_unique<olc::Renderer_DX10>();
5509 #endif
5510 
5511 #if defined(OLC_GFX_DIRECTX11)
5512  renderer = std::make_unique<olc::Renderer_DX11>();
5513 #endif
5514 
5515 #if defined(OLC_GFX_CUSTOM_EX)
5516  renderer = std::make_unique<OLC_RENDERER_CUSTOM_EX>();
5517 #endif
5518 
5519  // Associate components with PGE instance
5520  platform->ptrPGE = this;
5521  renderer->ptrPGE = this;
5522  }
5523 }
5524 
5525 #pragma endregion
5526 
5527 #endif // End OLC_PGE_APPLICATION
5528 
5529 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
5530 // | END OF OLC_PGE_APPLICATION |
5531 // O------------------------------------------------------------------------------O
